summary: This document is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, transmitting a clean version and a redlined version of the government's opposition to Ghislaine Maxwell's renewed bail application to the Second Circuit Court of Appeals.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the bail appeal; the government is opposing her renewed application for bail.

events.title: Transmission of Bail Opposition Filing
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends the government's opposition to Ghislaine Maxwell's renewed bail application to the Second Circuit.

keyFacts: The document is an email transmitting legal filings related to Ghislaine Maxwell's bail appeal.
The government (via an AUSA) is opposing Maxwell's renewed application for bail.
The filing is directed to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit.
Two versions of the opposition document are attached: a clean version and a redlined version showing edits.
